items.prompt: If a product is ___, you don't pay VAT on it.
items.explanation: Exempt means not subject to a particular tax.

items.prompt: If you pay too much tax, the government ___ you a refund.
items.explanation: Zero conditional (general rule): If + present, present.

items.prompt: Your 'take-home' pay after taxes is your ___ salary.
items.explanation: Net income is the amount remaining after deductions.

items.prompt: Companies must submit a tax ___ every year.
items.explanation: A tax return is a document for reporting income and taxes.
VAT is the standard abbreviation for Value Added Tax.
